name: Nice fireworks
description:
Quick fireworks animation made in less than 24 hours (May be a bit laggy for small computer)

Press "O" to see the number of entity

Is more a test of the platform than a real test

May add some customisation later

I got a slight fps drop on school desktop (i5 8700k, 8go Ram(Did not used more than 4 with some shits running in bg))
